group_1.textRight: That photo on Yozuru's account was definitely@the beach house!

group_1.textLeft: Hachi's tank... Yeah, it's completely destroyed.
More importantly, why is the tank shattered?
And who exactly took the photo and sent it to us?

group_1.textRight: ...Maybe it's the same person hijacking our@accounts?

group_1.textLeft: The person taking over accounts might be...
What's the meaning of all this?!

group_1.textRight: We didn't do anything! I don't know why you're@so mad at us!

group_1.textLeft: The hell are you doing, spreading this all over@the internet?!
To think you wanted to use my beach house for@a movie...!
Get out! I better not see you around here again@in my life!

group_1.textRight: What on earth happened to his store...?

group_1.textCenter: Everyone, look at the Open Discussion tab in the@Tomo-C app!

group_1.textRight: Open Discussion...? Sounds like something@everyone can see...

group_1.narration: "We found your missing octopus!@You were all so very grateful, but here's the thing:@We were the ones who stole him in the first place!"

group_1.textRight: They posted a photo of Hachi escaping!

group_1.textLeft: And there's another photo of the broken@aquarium!

group_1.narration: "This time, we broke his aquarium for good@so he can never return.@Hachi's going for a long swim in the sea!"

group_1.textRight: That's the photo that was posted on Yozuru's@account...!

group_1.narration: "We broke that dingy old Legend of the Mermaid sign, too!@It's about time you guys replaced it with a better one."
"The five of us made so many fun memories together!@The beach is awesome! Everyone should try it out☆@Spread the word to your friends!"

group_1.textLeft: Whoever this person is, they've been busy...
Well, I guess I should say, "we've" been busy.

group_1.textRight: But... we didn't do any of this!

group_1.textLeft: Denying it won't do us any good if we can't find@the culprit.
Using our accounts... without our permission...

group_1.textRight: Who the hell would do something like this?!
